description: A collection of cross reference building blocks.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Creates a new cross reference building block.

parameters.description: Character style to be applied to the building block. (Optional)
parameters.name: appliedCharacterStyle

parameters.description: Building block custom text. Currently this is only useful in custom string building block. It is ignored for other types of building blocks. (Optional)
parameters.name: customText

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new BuildingBlock (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the BuildingBlock.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the BuildingBlock with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the BuildingBlocks within the specified range.

parameters.description: The BuildingBlock, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: BuildingBlock, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The BuildingBlock, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: BuildingBlock, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first BuildingBlock in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last BuildingBlock in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle BuildingBlock in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the BuildingBlock with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the BuildingBlock that follows the desired BuildingBlock.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the BuildingBlock whose index follows the specified BuildingBlock in the collection.

parameters.description: The BuildingBlock whose index comes before the desired BuildingBlock.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any BuildingBlock in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every BuildingBlock in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BuildingBlock.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the BuildingBlock with the specified index.

name: BuildingBlocks
